[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rest-client/src/lib.rs] [Function: get_resource()] [Deserialization Mismatch] Does get_resource() at line 1177 properly handle type mismatches during serde_json deserialization, or can an attacker cause type confusion by requesting wrong resource types? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rest-client/src/lib.rs] [Function: get_table_item_bcs()] [Key Collision] Does get_table_item_bcs() properly handle hash collisions in table keys, or can an attacker craft colliding keys to access wrong table entries? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rest-client/src/lib.rs] [Function: build_url_for_pagination()] [Cursor Injection] Does build_url_for_pagination() sanitize the cursor parameter, or can an attacker inject malicious cursor values to skip pages or access unauthorized data? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rest-client/src/lib.rs] [Function: paginate_with_cursor()] [Infinite Loop] Can the loop in paginate_with_cursor() starting at line 1868 be exploited by returning malicious cursor values that cause infinite pagination, leading to resource exhaustion? (Medium)
